FilingInformation.ContactOffice: Office of Terrorism and Financial Intelligence (TFI) – Manager, N & S Holding LLC

Transaction.Notes: Routing inconsistent with escrow instructions; suspected layering/structuring.

SuspiciousActivity.Narrative:
IC3 Submission ID 7065f60922b948a59af3a8654edb16dd. On 2023-02-09, Zeig IOTA Escrow received an urgent email spoofing a title officer with altered wire instructions. Funds from operating account ***1002 were moved via intermediary accounts #2304977980 (River Bank & Trust) and #2000043165557 (Great Lakes Commercial Bank) before final dispersal to YBH Holdings LLC (***4581) and Eisenstein Buyers (***9217), followed by additional transfers to layered offshore vehicles in Curaçao and the BVI.
Escrow personnel confirmed the email header resolved to an anonymized SMTP relay located in Eastern Europe and that MFA alerts were disabled shortly before the transfer window. IP traffic logs and voice recordings gathered by N & S Holding LLC’s AML team are preserved in the attached annex. Recovery efforts were initiated the same day through the FBI Recovery Asset Team and Banesco USA’s fraud desk; subpoena responses for final dollar amounts and SWIFT UETR identifiers are pending.
Immediate dissemination requested to FinCEN BSA E-Filing for SAR processing, FBI IC3 Recovery Asset Team for asset freeze support, and IRS-CI Fraud/Money Laundering Referral desk for coordinated follow-up. Additional victims are being identified through counterparty analysis.

Attachment.Description: Annex supplement with transaction tables, flowchart, compliance recommendations, and embedded subpoena request.
